edu.rit.pj2

Class JarClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • edu.rit.pj2.JarClassLoader

  • public class JarClassLoader
extends java.lang.ClassLoader
    Class JarClassLoader provides a class loader that obtains class files from a byte array holding the contents of a Java archive (JAR) file.

    Class JarClassLoader supports loading of classes. Class JarClassLoader supports loading of resources via the getResourceAsStream() method. The other methods for loading resources are not supported.

    When running a Job or a Task, the pj2 launcher program installs a JAR class loader in the process if the jar=file option is specified. A JAR class loader is also installed in the process running a job's task if the jar=file option is specified.

      Construct a new JAR class loader.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JarClassLoader

        public JarClassLoader(byte[] jar)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Construct a new JAR class loader. The parent class loader is the system class loader.
        Parameters:
        jar - Byte array with the contents of the JAR file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if jar is null.
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if the JAR file's contents could not be extracted from the jar byte array.

      • JarClassLoader

        public JarClassLoader(java.lang.ClassLoader parent,
              byte[] jar)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Construct a new JAR class loader with the given parent class loader.
        Parameters:
        parent - Parent class loader.
        jar - Byte array with the contents of the JAR file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if jar is null.
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if the JAR file's contents could not be extracted from the jar byte array.
